course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Sustainable Urban Development and Responses to Climate Change
course.description: This course explores Sustainable Development of Hong Kong, Taipei, and Guangzhou by combining study tours with lectures given by academic and corporate experts. The course will provide students with insights into citiesâ€™ sustainability challenges such as climate change and investigate how mitigation and adaptation measures can contribute to sustainable urban development. Students will travel to different cities and be immersed in local environment and culture. Site and company visits further enrich the course program.
